document_data.mainbody:
Gorstaf was a duergar baker, who specialized in fungus pies, from the Gracklstugh in the Underdark in the late 15 century DR.
Gorstaf was a duergar man with obsidian black skin. He had a long bushy white beard and wore a chefs toque and was armed with a menacing-looking oversized spoon.
Gorstafs bakey was located in the Darklake district of Gracklstugh, an odd place for a bakery due to the districts size and population. Gorstafs menu included bluecap pies, ripplebark pies, and myconid pies, among others.
